io.leonis.zosma.function

Class LambdaExceptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.leonis.zosma.function.LambdaExceptions

  • public final class LambdaExceptions
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to handle checked exceptions in lambdas. From How can I throw CHECKED exceptions from inside Java 8 streams?. This class helps to handle checked exceptions with lambdas.

      • rethrowRunnable

        public static <E extends java.lang.Exception> java.lang.Runnable rethrowRunnable(LambdaExceptions.RunnableWithExceptions<E> runnable)
        Rethrows exceptions caught in a LambdaExceptions.RunnableWithExceptions as unchecked exceptions.
        Type Parameters:
        E - The type of exception thrown by the consumer
        Parameters:
        runnable - The consumer to run.
        Returns:
        A new consumer which rethrows exceptions as unchecked exceptions.

      • rethrowConsumer

        Rethrows exceptions caught in a LambdaExceptions.ConsumerWithExceptions as unchecked exceptions.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • rethrowBiConsumer

        public static <T,U,E extends java.lang.Exception> java.util.function.BiConsumer<T,U> rethrowBiConsumer(LambdaExceptions.BiConsumerWithExceptions<T,U,E> biConsumer)
        Rethrows exceptions caught in a LambdaExceptions.BiConsumerWithExceptions as unchecked exceptions.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of object accepted by the bi-consumer in the first argument.
        U - The type of object accepted by the bi-consumer in the second argument.
        E - The type of exception thrown by the bi-consumer.
        Parameters:
        biConsumer - The bi-consumer to run.
        Returns:
        A new bi-consumer which rethrows exceptions as unchecked exceptions.

        Rethrows exceptions caught in a LambdaExceptions.FunctionWithExceptions as unchecked exceptions.

        R - The type of object returned by the function.
        E - The type of exception thrown by the function.

      • uncheck

        public static <T,R,E extends java.lang.Exception> R uncheck(LambdaExceptions.FunctionWithExceptions<T,R,E> function,
                                                            T target)
        Rethrows exceptions caught in a LambdaExceptions.FunctionWithExceptions as unchecked exceptions.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The type of object accepted by the function.
        R - The type of object accepted by the function.
        E - The type of exception thrown by the function.
        Parameters:
